Changelog nicescroll release 3.1.4
http://areaaperta.com/nicescroll
https://github.com/inuyaksa/jquery.nicescroll


New options
- cursorfixedheight:false, cursor with fixed height (high priority on cursorminheight) - close #146


Fixes
- missing sensitiverail for horizontal rail, thanks to aNt1X - close #147
- Chrome, mousewheel on horizontal rail doesn't work - close #145
